title: Bug 6322 - All types dialog shows obfuscated classes
description: JDK 1.4 includes obfuscated classes (a, a1, b, c, d) etc.
OB: The All types dialog displays obfuscated class names.
EB: The obfuscated classes should be less prominent.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the All types dialog.
2. Note the presence of obfuscated class names.
3. Expect the obfuscated classes to be less prominent.
4. Suggested options:
   a) Sort lower case class names after the ones that start with a capital letter.
   b) Filter out the obfuscated classes completely. I suggest option a).
